channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description: Everytime I try to log on It tells me theres an "error connecting to server" and it doesnt let me log on. Do I need to modify my server ip or anything? It was working just fine then suddenly it stopped working. Please help!

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @Lanepker Lanepker
item.description:
@Lanepker wrote:

Have you changed the IP of the server in the client and server itself?

Read full topic
